languages.text: "На Фенрисе говорят: если отчаянно искать встречи со смертью, она настигнет тебя в ту секунду, когда ты от нее отвернешься".
"There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."
languages.original_text: "На Фенрисе говорят: если отчаянно искать встречи со смертью, она настигнет тебя в ту секунду, когда ты от нее отвернешься".

traits.locale_text: "There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."
"There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."
"There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."
"There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."
"There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."
"There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."

languages.text: « Sur Fenris, on dit que la mort vient trouver ceux qui la cherchent dès l'instant où ils lui tournent le dos. »
languages.original_text: "There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."

traits.locale_text: « Sur Fenris, on dit que la mort vient trouver ceux qui la cherchent dès l'instant où ils lui tournent le dos. »

languages.text: «En Fenris hay un dicho: si buscas un encuentro con la muerte, te encontrará en cuanto le des la espalda».
languages.original_text: "There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."

traits.locale_text: «En Fenris hay un dicho: si buscas un encuentro con la muerte, te encontrará en cuanto le des la espalda».

languages.text: 「フェンリスにはこういう諺がある。死と対面したいなら、背を向けた瞬間に出会える、と」
languages.original_text: "There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."

traits.locale_text: 「フェンリスにはこういう諺がある。死と対面したいなら、背を向けた瞬間に出会える、と」

languages.text: “芬里斯有句谚语：如果你打算和死亡见面，它便会在你背对着它的那一刻找上门来。”
languages.original_text: "There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."

traits.locale_text: “芬里斯有句谚语：如果你打算和死亡见面，它便会在你背对着它的那一刻找上门来。”

languages.text: "Auf Fenris sagt man: Wenn du den Tod treffen willst, findet er dich in dem Moment, wenn du ihm den Rücken zukehrst."
languages.original_text: "There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."

traits.locale_text: "Auf Fenris sagt man: Wenn du den Tod treffen willst, findet er dich in dem Moment, wenn du ihm den Rücken zukehrst."

languages.text: "Fenris'te 'Ölüm isteyen, ölüme sırtını döndüğü anda ona kavuşur.' diye bir laf vardır."
languages.original_text: "There is a saying on Fenris: if you seek a meeting with death, it will find you the moment you turn your back to it."
